Description: Results are not sorted in descending order when the 'Computer name' table header is clicked
Pre conditions:
1. Web Browser
2. Computer database URL
3. At least two computers with different 'Computer name' must exist in the computers database
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open web browser
2. Clear browser cache
3. Navigate to http://computer-database.herokuapp.com/computers within the web browser
4. Click on 'Computer name' table heading in the computers table
Expected result: 1. On clicking the 'Computer name' table heading the results do not get sorted in descending order

Description: Web parameter tampering not handled on 'Edit computer' page
Pre conditions: 1. TC2.1 must be run before this test
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open web browser
2. Clear browser cache
3. Navigate to http://computer-database.herokuapp.com/computers/hello within the web browser
Expected result: 1. Web browser returns a heading of "Bad Request" with an error message stating "For request 'GET /computers/hello' [Cannot parse parameter id as Long: For input string: "hello"]"

Description: "Application error" when adding a new computer to the computer database with a computer name of over 10,000 characters
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://computer-database.herokuapp.com/computers within the web browser
3. Click on 'Add a new computer' button in the top right hand corner of the screen
4. Copy BUG1.InputData.txt contents in to the 'computer name' field
5. Click on 'Create this computer' button in the bottom left hand corner of the screen
Expected result: 1. On clicking 'Add a new computer' button the screen displays "Application error"

Description: "Application error" when trying to filter computers in the computer database with a computer name of over 5,000 characters
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open web browser
2. Clear browser cache
3. Navigate to http://computer-database.herokuapp.com/computers within the web browser
4. Copy BUG2.InputData.txt contents in to the 'Filter by computer name' input field in the top left hand corner of the screen
5. Click on 'Filter by name' button in the top left hand corner of the screen
Expected result: 1. On clicking 'Filter by name' button the screen displays "Application error"

Description: The same date is entered for introduced date and discontinued date
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://computer-database.herokuapp.com/computers within the web browser
3. Input "Sample-Computer" in the 'Filter by computer name' input field in the top left hand corner of the screen
4. Click on 'Filter by name' button in the top left hand corner of the screen
5. Click on the first computer name in the table which displays a list of added computers
6. Input "2021-10-02" in the 'Introduced date' input field 
7. Input "2021-10-02" in the 'Discontinued date' input field 
8. Click on 'Save this computer' button in the bottom left hand corner of the screen
Expected result: Add a new computer and enter the same date is entered for introduced date and discontinued date. No validation error showed for the same date.
